name: Vali
title: Vali - Norse Mythology
subtitle: God of Vengeance
shortDescription: Son of Odin , born specifically to avenge Baldr 's death. Vali grew to full adulthood in a single day and killed Hod before the day was done. He will survive Ragnarok and inherit the new world.
longDescription: After Baldr 's death, it was prophesied that vengeance could only be taken by a son of Odin who was not yet born. Odin fathered Vali with the giantess Rindr specifically for this purpose. Vali grew to adulthood in a single day and immediately killed Hod to avenge Baldr , fulfilling the requirement of blood vengeance. He represents the inexorable nature of fate and the necessity of vengeance in Norse culture.
